# nv-subtitle



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                                    | Description |
| ------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `--nv-subtitle-color Color of the subtitle`             |             |
| `--nv-subtitle-font-family Font family of the subtitle` |             |
| `--nv-subtitle-font-size Font size of the subtitle`     |             |
| `--nv-subtitle-font-weight Font size of the subtitle`   |             |
